```{r include=FALSE}
#Add your metadata here!

Project_Area<-"Western Skink range in British Columbia"
Current_scientific_name<- "Plestiodon skiltonianus"
Common_names<-"Western Skink"
Species_code<-"A-ASTR"
Provicial_ranking<-"Yellow"
Federal_ranking<-"Special Concern"
Cultural_significance<-"N"
Life_requisite<-"LI"
Life_stage<-"All"
SHM_objective<-"Guiding field surveys"

```


```{r include=FALSE}
SHMPlanning_mat<- matrix(data = c(Project_Area, Current_scientific_name,Common_names, Species_code, Provicial_ranking, Federal_ranking,Cultural_significance, Life_requisite, Life_stage, SHM_objective, Funding_source, Model_creation_date, Model_evaluators, Model_evaluation_date, Disclaimer, Suggested_citation), nrow = 1, ncol = 16)

colnames(SHMPlanning_mat)<-c("Project_Area", "Current_scientific_name","Common_names", "Species_code", "Provicial_ranking", "Federal_ranking","Cultural_significance", "Life_requisite", "Life_stage", "SHM_objective", "Funding_source", "Model_creation_date", "Model_evaluators", "Model_evaluation_date", "Disclaimer", "Suggested_citation")

SHMPlanning_tab<-as.data.frame(SHMPlanning_mat)

transpose<-t(SHMPlanning_tab)
```
